name: Rates
desc: Access to the world’s highest-potential rates markets.Trade in derivatives, securities, cross-currency products, structured rate products, and financing products. - Benefit from broad product capabilities and understanding of nuances across these markets.

name: Fixed Income
desc: Global team of fixed income specialists. Market access opportunities from long-established onshore operations in emerging and frontier markets. Actionable trade ideas generated by investment strategists.

name: Equities
desc: Access to major stock exchanges globally. Equity products: listed equities, ETFs, listed warrants, equity structured notes, and derivatives. Trading capabilities include Direct Market Access and algorithmic strategies.

name: Foreign Currency
desc: Market-leading breadth of product offerings. Speed of execution and quality pricing in OTC FX Derivatives. Customized solutions for cash flow requirements and strategic trading.

name: Structured Products
desc: Limit downside risk or seek higher returns. Open architecture platform with a wide range of payoffs and pricing from best-in-class institutions.

name: Mutual Funds
desc: Proprietary fund selection process. Independent list of 100-150 mutual funds across asset classes. Access to strategies from developed to frontier markets.

name: Discretionary Portfolio
desc: Signature program with discretionary portfolio management. Boutique third-party investment managers and in-house expertise. Diverse portfolios across asset class, geography, sector, and manager.

name: Lending
desc: Lombard lending across various asset classes. Cross-border financing solutions. Structuring expertise for collateral including real estate and promoter shares.

name: Alternatives
desc: Curated alternative investment platform. Exclusive investment opportunities for clients.
